query:
SELECT tipoServicoCompra, COUNT(*) as total,
       SUM(valorTotal) / 100 as valor_total_reais
FROM despesas_v2
WHERE tipoServicoCompra LIKE '%Equipamento%' 
   OR tipoServicoCompra LIKE '%Utensílio%'
   OR tipoServicoCompra LIKE '%Bem%'
GROUP BY tipoServicoCompra;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3WG3DCJNDgKq1ck.d12df11ceaba --database axWmxYbCBHHB5ETKSgA95A --execute SELECT tipoServicoCompra, COUNT(*) as total,
       SUM(valorTotal) / 100 as valor_total_reais
FROM despesas_v2

   OR tipoServicoCompra LIKE '%Utensílio%'
   OR tipoServicoCompra LIKE '%Bem%'
